name: Kosen's curse
description:
Survive through a deep black and white forest and discover what live here with the possibility to climb everywhere. Find each pages of those who tried it before you. 

                  Controls : 
  • WASD (or directional arrows) to move
  • Escape to pause the game and read collected pages
                   Credits :
  • Benoit Deneaux
  • Paul Lyaudet
  • Tristan Reyne --> https://www.facebook.com/tristan.reyne
